description:
Are you ready to expand your teaching expertise into online or offer in-person training workshops?

Did you know you can get paid to produce your video tutorials before you even offer an online course?

“I have enrolled up to 60 courses in Udemy. I hate most of the courses. This course is world apart. Best resource on teaching and I learned a lot from Robb. I am very excited to finish this course.” —Phani Raju

This step-by-step class, taught by a top online instructor, will show you how to earn money teaching what you love.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

“Robb presents very interesting tips and strategies to improve your earnings on-line. Also, he has a calm and fluid way to present the classes, making then both a pleasure to watch and hard to let go.” — Paulo Andrade, Ph.D.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

This course is continuously updated.

“I particularly like the fact that Robb updates his courses on a regular basis with new content in this fast paced field. If something new comes out he adds it and points to how useful it can be. I was really impressed.” — Leon Cych

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Sharing my expertise online has earned me six-figure contracts, a professional day rate, and invitations to speak at global conferences. All with free travel!

You can make a good living teaching the things you know best!

In this course I will show you how I was able to quit my office job and go into business myself teaching what I love.

My methods are clearly explained and well-illustrated.

“Excellent content - and a course well worth giving time to. A journalistic approach to the presentation - made it interesting and relevant to me. I like this man's way of thinking.” — Heather Harman

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

These methods are clearly explained and well-illustrated.

  1. Convert contacts into paying clients.
  2. Get paid to produce your video tutorials before you even offer an online course.
  3. Pay $0 to affiliates and advertisers to get new students.
  4. Leverage your contacts with the "Facebook For Grownups!"
  5. How I got my new course offer mailed out to 20,000 targeted people, for free.
  6. Develop super fans to get repeat business.
  7. My newsletters have a 40% open rate and that is more than double the industry average of 16.6 percent.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

I encourage you to learn how to maximize your earning potential

No previous marketing experience is required.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Important information before you enroll

  • Take this course, risk-free. It is backed by a 30 day money-back guarantee, full refund, no questions asked.
  • Once enrolled, you have unlimited lifetime access to the course
  • You will have instant access to all updates added to the course
  • Take a free preview and be assured of the lecture quality

"Great course! Very easy to understand. I learned everything I expected, and more. I started making movies right away and feel very inspired!”— Jennifer D

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

I launched my Udemy courses in November 2014 and I have been paid to travel to Singapore (Twice!), London, Dublin, USA, Prague, Italy, Austria, Hong Kong, Sweden, Belgium, and Canada.

You will be invited into my Berlin studio where I will not only tell you but I will show you many methods for how I grow a strong personal brand through teaching.

You can make a good living teaching the things you know best!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Who is this for?

This course is designed for anyone with an interest in earning more money teaching online.

“This course makes me want to learn everything that Robb has to offer! (But I'm a bit green with envy regarding that first book you showed.) Thanks Robb!" -Christine Tripp

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Enroll now and start earning more money teaching what you love.

Let’s get started!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
title: Teaching Online: How to Succeed as a Freelance Instructor
